# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="c64d9-102">變更您的語言、 日期和時間格式或網頁型 Outlook 中的時區</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c64d9-103">在頁面上，選取最頂端</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="c64d9-104">**設定** > **檢視所有的 Outlook 設定**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c64d9-105">選取 [**一般**] > **語言和時間**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="c64d9-106">選取您想要使用的語言。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="c64d9-107">選取**儲存**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c64d9-108">若要深入了解，請參閱[變更的時區和網頁型 Outlook 中的語言設定](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c64d9-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
